description:
While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Massive Confused Fight! The Straw Hats vs. the New Fish-Man Pirates!
Bagarre générale ! L’équipage au Chapeau de paille contre le Nouvel équipage des Hommes-Poissons
Dairansen! Ichimi Tai Shin Gyojin Kaizokudan!
Беспорядочные бои! Мугивары против Новых Пиратов Рыболюдей!
大乱戦! 一味VS新魚人海賊団!
